evidence.claim: Auracal Senior Home Care adheres to HIPAA regulations for data protection in senior care operations.
The company utilizes X12 EDI transaction sets for handling healthcare claims and payments.
FHIR standards are implemented for interoperability in patient records and data sharing.
Auracal Senior Home Care is active in using HL7 protocols for healthcare data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of using X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found.
